official_title: A bill to amend the Tariff Act of 1930 to exempt from duties equipments and repairs to certain vessels, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Act of 1930 to exempt vessels designed and used primarily for transporting passengers or property from the duty on equipment and repairs made in a foreign country on a U.S. flag vessel unless the vessel left the United States for the sole purpose of obtaining such equipment or repairs.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Tariff Act of 1930 to exempt from duties equipments and repairs to certain vessels, and for other purposes.
